title: President confers military awards to armed forcesâ€™ officers, soldiers
content:
RAWALPINDI, Aug 14 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on the occasion of the 75th Independence Day celebrations conferred Military awards to the officers and soldiers of the Pakistan Army, Navy and Air Force.
The awards included two Sitara-i-Basalat, 68 Tamgha-i-Basalat, 33 Imtiazi Asnad, 68 COAS Commendation Cards, 22 Hilal-i-Imtiaz (Military), 102 Sitara-i-Imtiaz (Military) and 130 Tamgha-i-Imtiaz (Military), an Inter-Services Public Relations (ISPR) press release said.
The following officers were conferred with Sitara-i-Basalat: Major Shujaat Hussain (Shaheed), Baloch and Captain Muhammad Bilal Khalil (Shaheed), AMC GDMO.
The following officers and men have been conferred with Tamgha-i-Basalat: Local Brigadier Aamir Naveed Hussain,T.Bt & Bar SI(M), CMI, Capt Syed Haider Abbas (Shaheed), SSG, Capt Muhammad Saad Bin Amir (Shaheed), Artillery, SM Sher Muhammad (Shaheed), Sind, SM Muhammad Aslam (Shaheed), FC Balochistan (N), Sub Safdar Hayat (Shaheed), FF, N/Sub Zubaid Ali (Shaheed), Sind, N/Sub Shahid Ullah (Shaheed), FC Bln (S), Hav Zahid Gul (Shaheed), FC KP (S) and Hav Muhammad Nazir Khan(Shaheed), FC Bln (S).
